keyPolicies.policyDescription: Save this country £30 million per day, take control of borders and immigration, safeguard our own banking system.
Scrap the human rights act which protects criminals, get rid of stupid EU regulations that destroy jobs and take care of ordinary hard-working families.

issues.brexitEurope: Energy prices are too high due to the EU. We can't deport foreign criminals thanks to the EU. My local Post Office is closing because of the EU. Millions of animals will die in EU animal tests on products already proven safe. My weekly shopping costs £20 a week more because of the EU.
issues.environment: My petrol costs too much because of the EU. My fish and chips cost double thanks to the EU.
issues.governance: It will cost me hundreds of pounds more to sell my home because of the EU.
issues.immigration: Scrap the human rights act which protects criminals, get rid of stupid EU regulations that destroy jobs and take care of ordinary hard-working families.

housing.content: It will cost me hundreds of pounds more to sell my home because of the EU.

contactInformation.address: UKIP NorthWest, 7 King Street, Lancaster LA1 1JN

images.caption: UKIP says NO to European Union.

leaflet.additionalNotes: One MP. Two Lords. Nine MEPs. Dozens of councillors. The UK Independence Party is the UK's fourth-largest political party.
